alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jackson; Madison; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clarke, southeastern Jackson, northwestern Oglethorpe and southwestern Madison Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Diamond Hill, or near Danielsville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danielsville, Athens, Nicholson, Comer, Winterville, Colbert, Arnoldsville, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Westgate Park, James Holland Youth Sports Cmpx, Diamond Hill, Smithonia, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Oconee Heights, Barretts Mill, Dunlap, Neese and Beechwood Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
